xwikidoc.name: Governance
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.marta
xwikidoc.title: Project Governance
xwikidoc.content:
The PhenoTips open source project is governed by its [[Committers>>Committership]]. All important rules are decided by the committers, for the sake of the project and its community.
All PhenoTips users are encouraged to send feature requests of bug reports on [[the users mailing list>>Contact.Mailing Lists]] or on [[the issue tracker on GitHub>>https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues]], and they will be addressed as time permits.
